other_title: Detonator Orguss - O Guerreiro Mecánico Orgun (Portuguese)
デトネイターオーガン (Japanese)
plot: Fleeing from his own race, Orgun—an alien being with superhuman abilities and unearthly weapons—travels to Earth to find an answer to his origin. There, he bonds with a young man named Tomoru to defend Earth against the Evoluders, who seek nothing but destruction of other civilizations.
ending_theme: "Bandeira Ryokou Dan" by Susumu Hirasawa & The Tokyo Philharmoic Choir (ep 1)
"Bandiria Travellers" by Susumu Hirasawa, the Tokyo Philharmonic Chorus & Teru uchida Strings
"Clear Mountain Top" by Susumu Hirasawa & Jun Togawa
"Sanchou Harete" by Susumu Hirasawa & Makoto Togawa (ep 2)
"Root of Spirit" by Susumu Hirasawa & Asuka Kaneko's Section
"Tamashii no Furu Ri" by Susumu Hirasawa (ep 3)
